data.name: GameMaker Creator
data.detailed_description:
GameMaker
Unlimited access to the IDE (integrated development environment) and learning materials.

GXC Export
Export your game to the GXC and publish your game to the fast growing Opera GX audience of more than 10 million gamers.

Desktop Exports
Windows, macOS, and Linux platforms exports.
data.about_the_game:
GameMaker
Unlimited access to the IDE (integrated development environment) and learning materials.

GXC Export
Export your game to the GXC and publish your game to the fast growing Opera GX audience of more than 10 million gamers.

Desktop Exports
Windows, macOS, and Linux platforms exports.
data.short_description: Windows, Mac, and Linux Exports for GameMaker
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Microsoft 64bit Windows 7
  • Processor: 64bit Intel compatible Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 4-compliant onboard graphics
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Microsoft 64bit Windows 10
  • Processor: 64bit Intel compatible Quad Core CPU
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated OpenGL 4-compliant onboard graphics
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: macOS 10.14 Mojave
  • Processor: Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 4-compliant onboard graphics
  • Storage: 3 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: OS Catalina
  • Processor: Quad Core CPU
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated OpenGL 4-compliant onboard graphics
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
